title: Let’s Be Optimistic | Guests: Bruce Feiler & Maximo Alvarez | 7/17/20
description:
Glenn has few new “positive” predictions for the future of America and whether ending up in Nazi gulags or witnessing Jesus coming back is more likely. Tonight on Glenn TV, Big Brother Beck gives the latest brief on the Woke Party’s fight against Wrongthink in “1984 Is Now.” Bruce Feiler, author of “Life Is in the Transitions,” joins to discuss how we all can get through “lifequakes” and come out better in the end. Cuban immigrant Maximo Alvarez warns that the rise of Marxism in America is playing out exactly as it did for Fidel Castro. Black Lives Matter acolytes now have $1.6 billion in funding, while YouTube shut down last Wednesday’s special. And the Smithsonian has removed its controversial white culture flyer.
